biography_text: PERDUE, David Alfred, Jr., a Senator from Georgia; born in Macon, Bibb County, Ga., December 10, 1949; B.S., Georgia Institute of Technology, 1972; M.S., Georgia Institute of Technology, 1976; management consultant; company executive; elected as a Republican to the United States Senate in 2014 for the term ending January 3, 2021.
